attributes.action: Make Shareholders. hedge fund companies. and robots pay a social care tax
attributes.background: Shareholders who earn over £250.000 in profits. hedge fund companies and company robots are reducing the UK workforce for the sake of profits and in turn that reduces Tax and NI contributions. This is a large part of the shortage in the NHS & Social Care budget.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
